content: mori-style coquettish headband this is a romantic mori-girl inspired headband that features a beautiful continuous cable pattern **pattern details** style written instructions with partial charts included construction the headband is worked flat in a long strip then the ends are joined to form a loop finally the decorative borders are worked along the edges key point the highlight of this design is the seamless cable transition at the joining point making the pattern look continuous and infinite **tutorial video included ** + media title 1 a full step-by-step video tutorial is included in the pattern many beginners have successfully completed this project thanks to the detailed video guide if you only need help with specific parts you can easily navigate using the time codes provided in the video description happy knitting **support** if you have any questions feel free to send me a dm or leave a comment on the tutorial video ✨ instagram @knitlandkeeper 1 https //youtu be/ris4xjvs3w8
